title: Citi 2017 Investor Day
summary: New York - Citi will hold an Investor Day in New York City on Tuesday, July 25, 2017. CEO Michael Corbat and members of Citi's senior leadership team will deliver presentations and participate in a question and answer session. The conference will begin at 8:45 a.m. (EDT) and is expected to conclude by approximately 3 p.m. (EDT). Attendance in person is by invitation only.
